title: Ticket #2355: Unit tests for Ring buffer implementation
description: We use a hand-coded ring buffer implementation to track statistics. Want unit tests for this new code.
remarks:
2011-Sep-12 11:07:32 by johnkn:
Added PublishDebug methods for many of the statistics probes, these methods print out the internal structure of the ring buffer. This is not the same thing as a unit-test but evaluation of this output over time can be used to verify the correctness of the ring buffer.
